text: I like being alone. I have control over my own shit. Therefore, in order to win me over, your presence has to feel better than my solitude. You're not competing with another person, you're competing with my comfort zones.
author: Horacio Jones

text: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
author: Justin Timberlake

text: I think it's very healthy to spend time alone. You need to know how to be alone and not defined by another person.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Solitude is the soil in which genius is planted, creativity grows, and legends bloom; faith in oneself is the rain that cultivates a hero to endure the storm, and bare the genesis of a new world, a new forest.
author: Mike Norton

text: The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to oneself.
author: Michel de Montaigne

text: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing.
author: Chantal Kreviazuk

text: The greatest thing in the world is to know how to be one's own self.
author: Michel de Montaigne

text: When we truly realize that we are all alone is when we need others the most.
author: Ronald Anthony

text: I don't want to be alone, I want to be left alone.
author: Audrey Hepburn

text: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: George Washington

text: The person who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The person who walks alone is likely to find himself in places no one has ever seen before.
author: Albert Einstein

text: When we cannot bear to be alone, it means we do not properly value the only companion we will have from birth to death - ourselves.
author: Eda LeShan

text: The man who goes alone can start today, but he who travels with another must wait till that other is ready.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: I don't want to be alone forever, but I love gypsy life.
author: Drew Barrymore

text: It's far better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Sometimes, you need to be alone. Not to be lonely, but to enjoy your free time being yourself.
author: Unknown

text: It's easy to stand in the crowd, but it takes courage to stand alone.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: I restore myself when I'm alone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Being alone is one thing, but feeling alone is a whole different story.
author: Unknown

text: I think it's very healthy to spend time alone. You need to know how to be alone and not defined by another person.
author: Simone Elkeles

text: I think it's important to find the little things in everyday life that make you happy.
author: Paula Cole

text: Sometimes the best thing you can do for yourself is to give yourself a little space.
author: Jocelyn Soriano

text: The best way to be happy with someone is to learn to be happy alone. That way the company will be a matter of choice and not necessity.
author: Unknown

text: People who are not happy with themselves can't possibly be happy with you.
author: Unknown

text: If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone.
author: Maxwell Maltz

text: Don't be scared to walk alone. Don't be scared to like it.
author: John Mayer

text: Sometimes you just need to be alone and let your tears out.
author: null

text: The loneliest people are the kindest, the saddest people smile the brightest and the most damaged people are the wisest.
author: null

text: I'm not alone, I'm just in a relationship with my freedom.
author: null

text: Loneliness is not lack of company, loneliness is lack of purpose.
author: Guillermo Maldonado

text: I don't need someone to complete me, I only need someone to accept me completely when I'm alone.
author: null

text: Being alone does not mean you are lonely, and being lonely does not mean you are alone.
author: null

text: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: I restore myself when I'm alone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Sometimes you just need to be alone, no distractions, no interruptions, just you and your thoughts.
author: null

text: Sometimes, you just have to take a break, to be alone with yourself and your thoughts.
author: null

text: The strongest souls are not those who show strength in front of us, but those who win battles we know nothing about.
author: null

text: Solitude is the soul's holiday, an opportunity to stop doing for others and to surprise and delight ourselves instead.
author: Katrina Kenison

text: It's far better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: When we truly realize that we are all alone is when we need others the most.
author: Ronald Anthony

text: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
author: Wayne Dyer

text: I like being alone, but I hate being lonely.
author: null

text: Sometimes you just need to be alone, to take a break from everyone and everything to reflect on your life.
author: null

text: Don't be afraid to walk alone, because life is best lived when you are true to yourself.
author: unknown

text: You can be alone without being lonely, and you can be lonely in a crowd of people.
author: unknown

text: Sometimes, the person who tries to keep everyone else happy is the loneliest person.
author: null

text: When you're alone, silence is the loudest sound you'll ever hear.
author: null

text: It's better to be alone with dignity than in a relationship that requires you to sacrifice your self-respect.
author: null

text: We all walk alone, but the journey is easier when we hold hands.
author: null

text: When you're alone, you're forced to face your fears and your demons.
author: null

text: Solitude is not the same as loneliness. Solitude is a choice, loneliness is not.
author: Paul Tillich

text: The worst loneliness is not to be comfortable with yourself.
author: Mark Twain

text: I never found a companion that was so companionable as solitude.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
author: Laurence Sterne

text: I'm not anti-social, I'm just not social.
author: null

text: If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone.
author: Maxwell Maltz

text: I am not alone because loneliness is always with me.

text: I am not alone because loneliness is always with me.

text: I like being alone, but I hate being lonely.
author: null

text: I never feel alone because loneliness is always with me.

text: Being alone is scary, but not as scary as feeling alone in a relationship.
author: Amelia Earhart

text: Sometimes, you need to be alone. Not to be lonely, but to enjoy your free time being yourself.

text: Being alone can be beautiful, but being with someone you love is even more beautiful.

text: Sometimes, you just need to be alone and let your tears out.
author: null

text: The greatest thing in life is to love and be loved in return, even if you are alone.

text: Being alone is better than being with someone who doesn't appreciate you.

text: You can never be alone if you have books.

text: Sometimes, you need to be alone to find yourself again.

text: I am not alone because I am with my thoughts.

text: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self.
author: Mary Sarton

text: If you want to be happy, learn to be alone without being lonely.
author: null

text: Being alone doesn't have to mean being lonely.
author: null

text: The worst feeling is not being alone, it's being forgotten by someone you could never forget.
author: null

text: You may feel alone, but you are never truly alone. You are surrounded by the love and prayers of those who care about you.
author: null

text: The most terrifying thing is to accept oneself completely.
author: Carl Jung

text: You don't have to be lonely just because you are alone.

text: Being alone is scary, but it's also an opportunity to discover who you are and what you want.

text: Sometimes, the person who is always there for everyone else needs someone to be there for them.

text: I am alone, but I am not lonely.

text: Being alone is not a bad thing, it's just a time for you to discover yourself.
